definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: This kind of recognition has been growing in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 這種看法已經在亞洲膨脹起來。

sentences.english: To include all the geographical names will swell the bulk of this book too much.
sentences.chinese: 包含所有地理名會使這本書軀體脹起太多。

sentences.english: After that, as it gets colder, it expands.
sentences.chinese: 但以後水再變冷卻膨脹起來。

sentences.english: Allow the braided dough to rise one last time upon a baking sheet until it is the desired size.
sentences.chinese: 允許辮成麻花狀的麪糰發酵脹起成爲希望的尺寸。

sentences.english: The girl mustered up her courage to face the interview.
sentences.chinese: 女孩脹起勇氣接受口試。

sentences.english: The sex organs become tumescent, i. e. engorged with blood.
sentences.chinese: 性器官變得膨脹起來，也就是說性器官充血。

sentences.english: With huge puff the balloon was blown up and then suddenly burst.
sentences.chinese: 猛烈的吹氣後，汽球膨脹起來，突然又破掉了。

sentences.english: Chanel lady's cheeks inflate like a bicycle tyre.
sentences.chinese: 香奈兒女士的臉像自行車輪胎一樣膨脹起來。

sentences.english: One assumes they plump up concert revenues as well.
sentences.chinese: 可以想像他們同樣使音樂會收入膨脹起來。

sentences.english: Bulge the tube core automatically after swelling.
The reason for this is that in salt water, the grid work plumps as it spins.
sentences.chinese: 這一原因是，在鹽水中，晶格層當旋轉時會膨脹起來。

sentences.english: Tom took Brendan's hand and pressed it against the bulge in his track pants.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆拿着布倫丹的手，把它壓在他脹起的短褲上。

sentences.english: Her life jacket failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 她的救生衣未能充氣脹起。

sentences.english: The hills swell gradually up from the plain.
sentences.chinese: 山丘逐漸由平原膨脹起來。

sentences.english: The moisture turns to steam in the oven and it will puff up.
sentences.chinese: 水汽會在烤爐裏蒸發出來，液體軟陶會膨脹起來。

sentences.english: My heart fills up like a balloon that's about to burst.
sentences.chinese: 我的心像汽球般膨脹起來，就快要爆開了。
